headline: Run
pros: There weren't really any. I would say that the company matched HSA Contribution was good, but the insurance premiums were so high, they were a wash.
cons:
Will flex you into two or more roles to save a penny, all while condemning you for lackluster results.
Senior management disengaged from the employee experience, resulting in extremely high turnover.

headline: Ok place to work
pros: The corporate office had a cafeteria
cons: Not allowed to work fro home
